Package imagingbook.common.regions

Class BinaryRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<BinaryRegion>, Iterable<Pnt2d>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SegmentationBackedRegion
    public abstract class BinaryRegion
extends Object
implements Comparable<BinaryRegion>, Iterable<Pnt2d>

    This class represents a connected component or binary region. Instances of this class support iteration over the contained pixel coordinates of type Pnt2d, e.g., by 

     import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
 
 BinaryRegion R = ...;
 for (Pnt2d p : R) {
    // process point p ...
 }

    The advantage of providing iteration only is that it avoids the creation of (possibly large) arrays of pixel coordinates.

      • getOuterContour

        public abstract Contour getOuterContour()
        Get the (single) outer contour of this region. Points on an outer contour are arranged in clockwise order.
        Returns:
        the outer contour.

      • getInnerContours

        public abstract List<Contour> getInnerContours()
        Get all inner contours of this region. Points on inner contours are arranged in counter-clockwise order.
        Returns:
        the list of inner contours.
